tool.name: OGS: postLIE
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'postLIE'.
tool.command: if [ "$input_file" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$input_file.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$input_file' '${$input_file.element_identifier}'; fi; postLIE --input-file '$input_file.element_identifier' $no_overwrite --output-file output_1.vtu

param.name: input_file
param.label: input file
param.help: Input (.vtu | .pvd). The original PVD or VTU file name

param.name: no_overwrite
param.label: no overwrite
param.help: don't overwrite existing post processed VTU files

tool.help: This tool runs the **postLIE** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
